message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.HC. 

The paper deals with the recognition of human actions using Hidden Markov Model and pose descriptors. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of statistics and calculus measures in feature extraction also suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques. The focus on 3D skeletal actions indicates the relevance to multimedia (cs.MM) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) sub-categories.
